<S%H5921>"Against<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> do you <S%H6026>jest<s%>? <S%H5921>Against<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> do you <S%H7337>open<s%> <S%H7337>wide<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> And <S%H748>stick<s%> out your <S%H3956>tongue<s%>? Was I not <S%H2814>silent<s%> even for a <S%H5769>long<s%> <S%H5769>time<s%> So you do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> Me?

But the <S%H7307>wind<s%> will <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them up, And a <S%H1892>breath<s%> will <S%H3947>take<s%> [them away.] But he who <S%H2620>takes<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Me shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> And shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>"

"For I will not <S%H7378>contend<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> <S%H3808>Neither<s%> will I <S%H5331>always<s%> be <S%H7107>angry;<s%> For the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> would <S%H5848>grow<s%> <S%H5848>faint<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Me, And the <S%H5397>breath<s%> [of those whom] I have <S%H6213>made.<s%>

<S%H1254>Creating<s%> the <S%H5108>praise<s%> of the <S%H8193>lips.<s%> <S%H7965>Peace,<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to him who is <S%H7350>far<s%> and to him who is <S%H7138>near,<s%> <S%H559>"Says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>" and I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> him. "
